contents.text: Thank you for calling Mondo, the largest national staffing agency based in San Francisco specializing exclusively in high-end IT and digital marketing talent.
If you are a client looking to hire top tech professionals, press 1.
To post a new job requisition with our team, press 1.
Please hold for a client services specialist; we’ll connect you momentarily.

navigationGoals: Post a new job opening for a senior DevOps engineer
I’m running a veteran-owned IT consulting firm and need to post a new tech support position.
I need to post a new backend developer requisition with detailed technical requirements.
I need help posting a new IT job listing; I'm not sure how to complete the requisition.
I’d like to publish a new opening for a computational physics postdoc position in my research group.

contents.text: To discuss an existing job order, press 2.
Please hold for your account manager; you’re being transferred now.

navigationGoals: Check the status of our open full-stack developer requisition
I want to follow up on an existing software engineer requisition we placed last week.
I want to get a status update and discuss next steps on my current cybersecurity contractor order.
I want to review the status of a job order I placed and discuss it with my account manager.
I need an update on the candidate search for the quantum modeling engineer role we posted last week.

contents.text: If you are a candidate seeking new career opportunities, press 2.
To submit your resume to our recruiters, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with a candidate specialist.

navigationGoals: Submit my resume for IT project manager roles
I’d like to submit my resume and translate my military skills for IT project manager opportunities.
I’d like to submit my Cloud Infrastructure Engineer résumé and profile to your recruiting team.
I’d like to submit my resume for tech roles and need assistance uploading it.
I’d like to submit my CV for consideration for any machine learning or data science internships.

contents.text: For information on current job openings, press 2.
Please hold while we retrieve the latest job listings for you.

navigationGoals: Get information on current front-end developer job openings
I’m looking for current cybersecurity job openings that match my security clearance.
Please send me the latest frontend React developer job listings you have available.
I’m looking for current job openings in IT and need someone to walk me through them.
I’m interested in reviewing your current listings for entry-level positions in data analysis or software development.
